questions.text: What is the difference between RAM and ROM, in regard to classic games?

answers.text: RAM is the game data and ROM is just a misspelling.
RAM and ROM are terms related to something different.
A RAM is a vehicle, dude.
RAM is random access memory, and ROM is read only memory (which is the games program).
